markets.title: Will Tom Cruise be cast in a Film With Ana de Armas?
markets.rules_primary: If Tom Cruise is cast in a Film With Ana de Armas before Dec 31, 2030, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary: For the purposes of this market, “cast” refers to any credited acting role, including live-action and voice acting in animated films. Cameos or background appearances only qualify if the performer receives an official credit in the film’s cast list. Producer-only credits or other behind-the-scenes roles do not count. Uncredited cameos, extras, or walk-ons are excluded.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if the event occurs.
